raw_text:
For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain..
Philippians 1: 21
IN LOVING MEMORY OF
Shanthi

16 June, 1972 - 13 Oct, 2025

RAJAMANI MAHAL, OPP. C.S.I CHURCH,
CHITTOOR ROAD, SHOLINGHUR.

Family Members, friends and Relatives..
